item.description:
TITLE: STOCK SELECTION FOR TRADERS by KEN JENNINGS, CHARLES SCHWAB

DESCRIPTION: This workshop will cover a 3-step process to help select potentially better stocks to trade in any market environment. What you will learn: how to screen stocks, scan price charts, and identify better trade opportunities. MR. JENNINGS will allow plenty of time for questions and discussion.

BIO: KENNETH JENNINGS

KENNETH JENNINGS is the Active Trader Relationship Manager for Charles Schwab in New England and upstate New York. He joined Charles Schwab in January of 2000 after graduating from The Ohio State University in Columbus. While working with some of Schwab's most active investors, KEN worked towards and received his Master's Degree in Finance from the University of Colorado in Denver. He held a variety of roles at Schwab before moving to the Boston area in March of 2005. As an Active Trader Relationship Manager, KEN facilitates workshops covering topics like risk management, technical analysis, and trading strategies while also supporting local clients and employees regarding Schwab's Active Trading services.

PRE-MEETING Announcement:
The Boston Tiger Meeting of the Tiger Financial Network meets during the hour from 6:00 PM to 6:50 PM. Go to http://www.tfnn.com/b... to see the full announcement. For questions, see Bob Pod at bpodd@softwareresults.com. The meeting is the same room as the 7:00 meeting.

This meeting will have the following agenda:
6:00 - 6:50 Boston Tigers Meeting led by Bob Podd
7:00 - Meeting Begins:
- Doug's Market Talk
- Stockpicks led by Chris
- Feature talk by KEN JENNINGS

If you have friends that you talk stocks with then bring them with you!

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room.

MIT Campus Map with Building E51:
http://whereis.mit.ed...

This is a free meeting. There is no membership required.
item.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily November Meetup
